pages.text: While phantoms usually appear to hunt the sleep-deprived, you've nonetheless found a way to bind these creatures into your service.

When summoned while wearing a Necro Cape, the resulting phantom would appear translucent and gain the ability to pass through blocks! One can call these creatures through the use of a $(l:focuses/necromancy/phantasm_focus)Phantasm Focus$(), or through a ritual which summons one without a limited lifespan.
